fullplot: Based on the bestselling book series about seven friends whose babysitting business leads to one adventure after another. When tomboy Kristy, president of the club, has a brilliant idea to run a summer day camp, the girls all agree it's the perfect way to spend their summer--together! But life gets complicated as budding romance, family problems and a trio of scheming snobs all conspire to ruin the club. The BSC gang learn for themselves the amazing power of friendship.
plot: Seven junior-high-school girls organize a daycare camp for children while at the same time experiencing classic adolescent growing pains.
title: The Baby-Sitters Club
